title: Britain's Got Talent 2019, live semi-final 4, recap: Sulky Simon steals the show as weird factor goes through the roof
text:
There was a spellbinding conclusion to the fourth Britain’s Got Talent 2019 semi-final with velvet-voiced magician Ben Hart winning a place in the weekend’s grand decider. He will be joined by show-tune belter Mark McMullan who split the judges but won out ahead of comedic conjurer Graeme Matthews after placing higher in the public vote.

“You look stunned,” said Dec as Hart was revealed to have won the contest. “I am….stunned,” came the woozy reply from the triumphant trickster, who sounded as if he’d been belted repeatedly over the head with a David Walliams hardback.

It was a satisfying conclusion to a deeply weird episode which counted among its highlights eccentric harpists, borderline...
description: There was a spellbinding conclusion to the fourth Britain’s Got Talent 2019 semi-final with velvet-voiced magician Ben Hart winning a place in the weekend’s grand decider.
